data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Zeeland, Netherlands a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Zeeland, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Zeeland, Netherlands honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Zeeland, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Zeeland, Netherlands will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Father, I pray that the Tajik people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Tajik people know you.
Spirit, help the church in the state of Zeeland to exponentially multiply disciples.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Zeeland to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.section_summary:
the state of Zeeland, Netherlands has a population of 410,400.

We estimate Zeeland has 16,469 people who might know Jesus, 175,877 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 218,054 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 16,469 believers in Zeeland, Netherlands a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.
